programme.title: Serie A
programme.desc: Atalanta v Inter.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1993 final between Marseille and AC Milan at Munich's Olympiastadion. The occasion was later overshadowed by one of the biggest scandals in the sport's history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the extraordinary 1994 final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens between Fabio Capello's AC Milan and Barcelona, managed by Johan Cruyff and dubbed the 'Dream Team'.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1995 final in Vienna between Louis van Gaal's Ajax and AC Milan. A star-studded Ajax team featured Edwin van der Sar, Ronald and Frank de Boer and Edgar Davids.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1996 final between Ajax and Juventus in Rome. Juve's talented side included Didier Deschamps, Antonio Conte and Gianluca Vialli - all at the height of their powers.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 1996/97 UEFA Champions League final between Borussia Dortmund and Juventus in Munich. Armed with an expensively assembled squad, Juve were overwhelming favourites.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: Real Madrid went in search of their seventh European Cup title when they faced Juventus in the 1998 final in Amsterdam. The Serie A winners featured a 25-year-old Zinedine Zidane.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: The 1998/99 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Bayern Munich at the Nou Camp. Victory for United would clinch an historic treble.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 1999/00 UEFA Champions League final between Real Madrid and Valencia in Paris. Steve McManaman, signed from Liverpool the previous summer, featured for Madrid.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the dramatic 2001 final between Bayern Munich and Valencia in Milan. Bayern, chasing their first title in a quarter-century, featured a 20-year-old Owen Hargreaves.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: The 2001/02 UEFA Champions League final saw a star-studded Real Madrid face Bayer Leverkusen in Glasgow. The match featured arguably the greatest goal in the competition's history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003 final between Serie A rivals Juventus and AC Milan at Old Trafford. Paolo Maldini was aiming to lift the trophy as captain, just as his father had done in 1963.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League final between Monaco and Porto in Gelsenkirchen. Jose Mourinho would leave Porto to take over at Chelsea just days later.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: The 2004/05 UEFA Champions League final saw Rafa Benitez's Liverpool take on AC Milan in Istanbul. The match would go down as arguably the greatest European Cup final in history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: The 2005/06 UEFA Champions League final in Paris saw Arsenal face a pre-Lionel Messi Barcelona, then under the command of Frank Rijkaard, and featuring Ronaldinho in his pomp.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We rewind back to the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League final at the Olympic Stadium in Athens as AC Milan looked to avenge their defeat two years previously against the Reds.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Chelsea at Moscow's Luzhniki Stadium, the first all-English final in the competition's history.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2009 UEFA Champions League final between Barcelona and Man Utd in Rome. United were bidding to become the first team to defend the trophy in the modern era.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2010 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Inter Milan at the Bernabeu. Jose Mourinho was looking to become the third man to win it with two clubs.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: The 2010/11 UEFA Champions League final saw Manchester United come up against Pep Guardiola's Barcelona at Wembley, the scene of United's first European Cup success back in 1968.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Chelsea at the Allianz Arena. This was Chelsea's second final, having lost their first in 2008.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the all-German 2013 UEFA Champions League final between Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich at Wembley. Bayern had lost two finals in three years.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: The 2013/14 UEFA Champions League final in Lisbon saw Real Madrid go head-to-head with arch-rivals Atletico Madrid. Real aimed to become the first club to win the trophy 10 times.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League - Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the enthralling 2014/15 UEFA Champions League final between Juventus and Barcelona in Berlin. Barcelona were chasing their third Champions League title in six years.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the 2018 MotoGP race in Argentina.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the classic 2018 Dutch Grand Prix. Marc Marquez came out on top in a race that produced the closest top 15 finish in the sport of all time.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: Action from the 2018 Grand Prix of Austria.

programme.desc: A round-up of all the goals from Wednesday's fixtures, featuring Liverpool v PSV Eindhoven, Arsenal v Bayern Munich and Paris Saint-Germain v Tottenham Hotspur.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2005/06 season. Thierry Henry became the first player in the league's history to win the Golden Boot four times, top-scoring with 27 goals.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A look back at the best goals from the 2006/07 season. Chelsea's Didier Drogba topped the scoring charts with 20 goals, ahead of Benni McCarthy (18) and Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: The 2016 Italian Grand Prix.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the rain-affected 2016 Dutch Grand Prix in Assen. The treacherous conditions led to an incident-packed race, with a 750-1 outsider eventually storming to a shock win.

programme.title: MotoGP Classics: Brno 2016
programme.desc: We revisit the historic 2016 Czech Republic Grand Prix in Brno as Cal Crutchlow became the first British rider to win a premier class race since Barry Sheene in 1981.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Evidence points to an angry ex-boyfriend when a cocktail waitress is murdered outside a popular nightspot.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate when a baby is left abandoned with a note indicating the mother's kidnapping and quickly learn that she has been kidnapped by a copycat serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 9-year-old girl calls for help, claiming to be held hostage in a strange room for four days, many believe it is a prank, but Detective Benson feels otherwise.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The life of a law-abiding engineer (Robin Williams) goes terribly wrong, leading him to challenge authority and to urge others to do so as well.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives discover a kidnapped girl in the trunk of a stolen rental car; the suspect's rage seriously injures Stabler; the trial forces Novak to face dark things in her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives must solve a 5-year-old sexual assault case before the statute of limitations closes it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate two rapes that appear to have been committed by the same man; Mary Beth Hurt and Henry Winkler guest star.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a coed dependent upon financial aid is found dead with a large sum of cash, detectives suspect her wealthy roommate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A band of overweight teenage siblings attacks a gifted piano student from Harlem.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An unstable woman stops taking medication and mows down 10 people with her car; a former rock star wages an anti-psychiatric-drug campaign.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the disappearance of two high-school students from a museum field-trip; Stabler meets his new partner.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a congressman falsely accused of soliciting underage girls leads the SVU to a sex trafficking ring; Benson and Rollins are the targets of a salacious website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Carisi suspect a woman's bizarre rape story is fabricated; Benson goes on the offensive when her personal life is scrutinized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager disappears after schoolmates make her the subject of a vicious cyberbullying attack.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson must disclose the secrets of her past to help a rape victim recall the details of one terrible, traumatic night.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates a case involving two students in a special needs school; Rollins discovers that one child's medical issues stem from a surprising source.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An airline pilot accuses her captain of sexual assault; Fin makes sure Benson is protected at work.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an actress accuses a high-powered media mogul of attempted rape, Benson finds herself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse; changes in the squad room put Carisi between a rock and a hard place.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU joins an under cover task force in busting a human trafficking ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins goes under cover to find a suspect who is drugging and assaulting tourists, while Benson helps the victims sort out their memories from their hallucinations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins tries to root out a government worker who is withholding green cards in exchange for sex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The female CEO of a popular wellness company says she was raped, but her business partner claims the accusation is part of an embezzlement cover-up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Chief Garland must put friendship aside when a pastor at his church is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Kat respond to a dangerous domestic violence call while Fin gives his deposition in the lawsuit against him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi takes on a powerful judge when he inexplicably dismisses the rape case of a university student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU must contend with an angry neighborhood watch group when a girl goes missing near a building that houses several sex offenders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-profile activist suspects her sister has been kidnapped by a hate group; Garland and Benson push for change with NYPD brass; Kat gets some good news.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to investigate an unusual domestic violence case when his neighbor is found injured.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad spends New Year's Eve tracking down an Amber Alert, and Carisi faces off against counselor Rafael Barba in an emotional courtroom battle.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty; Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson tries to help a pop star in a volatile relationship; Rollins struggles with taking the stress of work home with her; Fin teaches a rookie a lesson in respecting fellow officers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation of a congressman falsely accused of soliciting underage girls leads the SVU to a sex trafficking ring; Benson and Rollins are the targets of a salacious website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Carisi suspect a woman's bizarre rape story is fabricated; Benson goes on the offensive when her personal life is scrutinized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager disappears after schoolmates make her the subject of a vicious cyberbullying attack.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson must disclose the secrets of her past to help a rape victim recall the details of one terrible, traumatic night.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The only witness to the beating of a woman (Judy Kuhn) is her daughter (Paulina Gerzon) who has Williams syndrome.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abused foster child (Jae Head), apprehended while driving a runaway van, leads the detectives to re-examine a case involving a rape victim (Sara Gilbert).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is found in Riverside Park, beaten and raped with no memory of what happened; during the investigation, Olivia must face the fact that she still thinks like a victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler begin to question the story of a missing teenager (Ellen Woglom) who returns home after four years, claiming to have been kept as a sex slave in a concrete cell.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mute girl is raped and beaten, and her drawing of her attacker resembles a local priest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An artist's shocking death leads detectives to uncover a long string of murders by an elusive serial killer.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Mornings
programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: The Reds host United at Anfield as they look to move past a high-scoring December draw. Liverpool relies on Hugo Ekitike to lead the attack in Mohamed Salah's absence. Leeds United tries to start the new year by securing another vital point.

programme.title: Premier League Live
programme.desc: Discussion and analysis of Premier League soccer.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Sunderland and Man City clash at the Stadium of Light to open 2026. City trail Arsenal by two points and need a win for top spot. Regis Le Bris's 7th-place side aims to protect their season-long unbeaten home record in a New Year matchup.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Goal Zone
programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A family vacation turns into a terrifying search for a missing wife and baby, then becomes a manhunt for a killer who committed a horrific crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a home invasion that ended with two dead leads to a shocking revelation about Detective Rollins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad tries to keep Detective Rollins' sister safe from her abusive boyfriend when she turns up beaten and pregnant; when Rollins is forced to take drastic action, an internal affairs investigation begins.
